contribution_desc: Slice WIM, a method for overview+detail visualisation of volume datasets that explores the potential of new interfaces made possible by a virtual reality (VR) environment made of two display surfaces: an interactive multi-touch table, and a stereoscopic display wall
devices_included: Tabletop, large horizontal display; Whiteboard, large vertical display
use_cases_desc:
Visualizing 3D medical data
Visualizing simulations of cardiovascular flows
